data.eml:eml: Two new larval species of the genus Erythraeus (Erythraeus) (Acari: Erythraeidae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khanjani, Mohammad, Mirmoayedi, Ali-Naghi, Fayaz, Bahman Asali, Sharifian, Tahereh (2012): Two new larval species of the genus Erythraeus (Erythraeus) (Acari: Erythraeidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 3479: 52-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214618
